pages.text: The $(thing)Bottling Machine$() fills fluids into containers. It can store up to 8 buckets of fluid, which is input through the blue ports on the metal tank.
Generally, the Bottling Machine will be able to fill any fluid container with an available filled version. It will also accept other items that can store fluids, for instance the $(thing)Jerrycan$().

The machine will hold onto any containers until it is completely full or the machine is no longer supplied with additional fluid. This can be disabled by using $(item)$(k:key.sneak)$() and $(item)$(k:key.use)$() on the machine with an $(thing)Engineer's Hammer$().

Additionally, the Bottling Machine can be used to create a variety of other items, such as $(thing)Duroplast$() and $(thing)Concrete Blocks$().$(br2)$(br2)A $(thing)Schematic$() of the Bottling Machine is avalable through the $(thing)Schematic Table$(). A material list can be found through the $(thing)Schematicannon$() or $(thing)JEI$().
